meico.audio.lame.mp3

Class ATH

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.audio.lame.mp3.ATH

  • public class ATH
extends java.lang.Object
    ATH related stuff, if something new ATH related has to be added, please plug it here into the ATH.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) float aaSensitivityP
      factor for tuning the (sample power) point below which adaptive threshold of hearing adjustment occurs
      (package private) float adjust
      Lowering based on peak volume, 1 = no lowering.
      (package private) float adjustLimit
      Limit for dynamic ATH adjust.
      (package private) float[] cb_l
      ATH for long block convolution bands.
      (package private) float[] cb_s
      ATH for short block convolution bands.
      (package private) float decay
      Determined to lower x dB each second.
      (package private) float[] eql_w
      Equal loudness weights (based on ATH).
      (package private) float floor
      Lowest ATH value.
      (package private) float[] l
      ATH for sfbs in long blocks.
      (package private) float[] psfb12
      ATH for partitioned sfb12 in short blocks.
      (package private) float[] psfb21
      ATH for partitioned sfb21 in long blocks.
      (package private) float[] s
      ATH for sfbs in short blocks.
      (package private) int useAdjust
      Method for the auto adjustment.
